title: Management of Atrial Fibrillation in Patients 75 Years and Older: JACC State-of-the-Art Review
authors: Annabelle Santos Volgman, Gatha Nair, Radmila Lyubarova, Faisal M. Merchant, Pamela Mason, Anne B. Curtis, Nanette K. Wenger, Neelum T. Aggarwal, James N. Kirkpatrick, Emelia J. Benjamin
